# pencilInteraction(_:didReceiveTap:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when a person double-taps Apple Pencil.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func pencilInteraction(_ interaction: UIPencilInteraction, didReceiveTap tap: UIPencilInteraction.Tap)
```
